attributes.action: together with his cabinet enter a state of suspended animation for a period of 10 days per month in order to reduce CO2 emissions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the rest of the year I suggest that politicians of all parties should be restraind from using the words TAX and TAXATION in conjunction with the the term Global Warming to reduce emissions. It should be recognised that hot air generated by politicians may (if you believe the CO2 emissions hype)be a major contributory factor in climate change.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
